thread.title: Great hotel with helpful staff
thread.title_full: Great hotel with helpful staff - Review of Point A Hotel, London Paddington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Philip M
title: Great hotel with helpful staff
text: Stayed here many times and usually book ahead but on this occasion it was very last minute that I found I had to stay in London. The staff at reception were extremely helpful however & went out of their way to sort me out with a room very efficiently. The rooms are always spotlessly clean & comfortable. You might find them small if you had a lot of luggage but I rarely have so not a problem. Bathrooms have all you need & good quality showers with plenty of hot water. There are no tea & coffee facilities in rooms but it is available in the foyer by reception 24 hours. Everything & more than you might expect at the price so good value for London.
